sentence.Network_en: This carpet was hand loomed in China.
sentence.Network_cn: 此地毯为手织地毯,产于中国.

sentence.Network_en: He was hand-picked for this job by the Admiral.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是由海军上将精心挑选出来担任这项工作的。

sentence.Network_en: Without warning, Bardo smacked his fist into his open hand.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴多没有任何预兆地一拳砸在自己摊开的手掌上.

auth_sentence.content: On the other hand, Java is three things.
